TopicTitle: Game will not load/start new campaign without crashing

Articles.Content:
Eager to try out the new patch I hopped into a new campaign and it was fine until I went into top orthographic view of the craft I was building. That then pulled up the settings menu however I was only able to navigate the bottom corner of the screen. Figuring this was a bug I restarted the game and tried loading back in to which it crashed.

verified game files which steam said 2 were unverified and downloaded them same issue. deleted and uninstalled the game twice though the issue still persists, also restarted computer. Something interesting I did notice was that changing to boarderless allowed it not to crash loading a campaign, but it would then be stuck on setup "OAB Part Seed Counter"

I do have the latest drivers for my GPU.
